elements.title: Estibaliz Urresola Solaguren (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that 20,000 Species of Bees, the first feature film by Estibaliz Urresola Solaguren (pictured), won numerous awards at film festivals?

elements.title: Guts (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that when discussing her album Guts, Olivia Rodrigo said she "grew 10 years between the ages of 18 and 20"?

elements.title: Ameles decolor (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Ameles decolor has one of the most complex mating rituals of any praying mantis?

elements.title: Bourdon House (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Duke of Westminster preferred Bourdon House to Grosvenor House?

elements.title: Ahmad Nasser Al-Mohammad Al-Sabah (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that former Kuwaiti foreign minister Ahmad Nasser Al-Mohammad Al-Sabah interrupted his studies in France to volunteer during the Iraqi invasion of Kuwait?

elements.title: This Stupid World (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that almost 40 years into their career, American indie rock band Yo La Tengo released their first self-produced album, This Stupid World, in 2023?

elements.title: Ferrial Sofyan (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Ferrial Sofyan was absent at the inauguration of his successor as deputy speaker of the Jakarta Regional People's Representative Council?

elements.title: Oklahoma tenderloin (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Oklahoma tenderloin is baloney?
